alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 7:55AM MST until December 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 2 inches from Orofino to Riggins. 3 to 6 inches for elevations above 3500 feet. * WHERE...White Bird Grade, Camas Prairie, Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, Grangeville and vicinity, Highway 12 Orofino to Kooskia, and Greer Grade * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region
